Support Black Lives?

Redire¢t will help you put your money where your mouth is.

Redire¢t your money away from big business and discover your new favorite Black-owned brands.

Coming soon to the Google Chrome Extension Store.

How It Works

Open the Redire¢t extension when shopping on Amazon and search for your favorite products.

Redire¢t will recommend Black-owned businesses that sell products in the same category.

Click "Visit Site" to shop from a Black-owned alternative and Redire¢t your shopping money!

Our Story

Redire¢t started at a Black Lives Hackathon. We won!

After watching the documentary 13th, our founder was inspired to help shoppers vote with their wallets by supporting Black-owned businesses.

Just one week later, our founder pitched the idea at the NYC Coders Hack for Black Lives hackathon.

Four incredibly talented developers joined her to form Team Redire¢t and in less than four days, the team built a working prototype, which was selected as 1 of 4 winning products out of 26 participating teams.

Today, the team has grown to over 10 people and we are working toward launching or extension to the Chrome store.

Want to receive updates about our progress or share a Black-owned business with us? Please get in touch!

Help Us

We want to support your community.

Help our movement by staying in touch and adding to our growing list of Black-owned businesses.

Join our mailing list to receive periodic updates about the progress of the project. We will never spam you or solicit your email address, ever! you'll be the first to know when we launch!

We want to increase the reach of Black-owned businesses and connect them with new customers. If you have a business you'd like to recommend, please let us know!
